channel.title: math.CV updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CV updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Precise estimates for certain distances in $\mathbb{R}^d$
item.description: arXiv:2412.10012v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We provide sharp estimates for the intrinsic distances of Finsler metrics with precise boundary estimates. These metrics include the Kobayashi-Hilbert metric near strongly convex points, the minimal metric near convex and strongly minimally convex points, and the $k$-quasi hyperbolic metric in $k$-strongly convex domains. Finally, we prove a characterization result in convex geometry for the $k$-quasi hyperbolic metric.
item.dc:creator: Matteo Fiacchi, Nikolai Nikolov

item.title: Solutions of Pascali systems attached to convex boundaries
item.description: arXiv:2403.14170v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Given a bounded strictly convex domain $\Omega\Subset \mathbb{C}$ and a point $q\in \Omega$ we construct a continuous solution of the Pascali-type elliptic system of differential equations that is centered in $q$, maps the unit disc into $\Omega$ and the unit circle into $\partial \Omega$.
item.dc:creator: Barbara Drinovec Drnov\v{s}ek, Uro\v{s} Kuzman
